title: Introducing Archon - The Revolutionary Operating System for AI Coding
description:
- Try Hostinger Horizons (code COLEMEDIN for 10% off): https://hostinger.com/colemedinhh

As powerful as AI coding assistants are, they almost completely lack two of the most important parts of context engineering - RAG and project management. I built Archon to solve this and completely revolutionize the way we code with AI today. I’m bringing it to you as a beta open source tool that I’m determined to build into the best possible tool for all AI coding. It’s a massive overhaul of my original Archon.

NOTE: The logo has changed for Archon to keep our branding unique! The logo was too similar to some other things before, and it's nice to bring the shield back from the previous Archon.

Archon is an entire operating system for AI coding. For you, it's a sleek interface to manage knowledge, context, and tasks for your projects. For the AI coding assistant(s), it's an MCP server to collaborate on and leverage the same knowledge, context, and tasks.

In this video I give you a full demo of Archon (currently in beta!), show you how to get started with it today, and even dive into the future of Archon with one of the other maintainers (Sean Buck) and how I’m integrating it with everything else I’m doing with context engineering.
